meanings.definition: Engaged in a fight or conflict
meanings.sent1: The combatted soldiers bravely defended their country.
meanings.sent2: The combatted team emerged victorious after a tough match.
meanings.sent3: The combatted kittens playfully wrestled with each other.
meanings.sent4: The combatted clouds clashed in the sky, creating a dramatic scene.
meanings.sent5: The combatted warriors' determination was evident in their eyes.

meanings.sent1: She combatted the cold weather by wearing a thick coat.
meanings.sent2: The hero combatted the villain to protect the city.
meanings.sent3: The chef combatted the bland taste of the soup with extra seasoning.
meanings.sent4: He combatted his fear of heights by climbing a tall mountain.
meanings.sent5: The students combatted boredom by playing an educational game.

meanings.definition: Took action to eliminate or reduce (something harmful)
meanings.sent1: The doctor combatted the virus with a new treatment.
meanings.sent2: The environmentalists combatted pollution by organizing a cleanup.
meanings.sent3: She combatted her messy room by tidying up before guests arrived.
meanings.sent4: The firefighters combatted the raging flames to save the forest.
meanings.sent5: The company combatted inefficiency by implementing new procedures.
